comments:

RemoteMachine environment: HPUX and Linux(IA32)

When executes Junit Test on remote machine, the process will stuck at 54%. There is no files deployed on remote machine. An error log:

Reassign to Scott due to its severity of 'blocker'.  Scott, please assess and reassign or fix as you see appropriate.

I was able to run the same scenario successfully (I used the RAC on: olthp1.torolab.ibm.com

I had the same hang at 54% before I logged in to the internal firewall, make sure this isn't the issue.
Incorrectly tested against the IAC by accident.

Hanging at 54% is also reported in bug 128482 on Solaris.
Wondering if this is related.

It appears this should all be working in the next build -- retesting is needed on various platforms such as HP, Solaris, Linux and also remote Windows.  Please retest in the next successful TPTP 4.2 build.
I just ran a test using build TPTP-4.2.0-200602220100 and it works.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
